original_text: Captain Nebuzaradan took hold of all those people. He brought them to the king of Babylon at Riblah.
korean_text: 사령관 느부사라단은 그들을 사로잡아 립나에 있는 바벨론의 왕에게 나아가매

sentences.original_text: Captain Nebuzaradan took hold of all those people.
sentences.korean_translation: 네부사르단 장교가 그 모든 사람들을 붙잡았습니다.

sentences.original_text: He brought them to the king of Babylon
